name: 5334project
body:
Project on Yelp Data-set Challenge:
We are finding the terms that are most commonly seen in reviews of a restaurant classified on the ratings. These terms are the important terms for starting a new venture in restaurant business of a particular city. The other thing that we are working is on trending food that we mine from the review data. 

Results
Th pie-charts represent the distribution percentage of terms (functionality of things in a restaurant) that help in getting lowest and highest stars in ratings.

![](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11342085/7486615/655bef58-f36d-11e4-8d7b-65bd42cce2fb.png))
